languages.text: "Пока долг не призовет меня... Я бы хотела провести с вами лучшие мгновения своей жизни. А что будет дальше — известно лишь звездам".
"Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."
languages.original_text: "Пока долг не призовет меня... Я бы хотела провести с вами лучшие мгновения своей жизни. А что будет дальше — известно лишь звездам".

traits.locale_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what happens next."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what happens next."

traits.locale_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “除非需要我履行职责……否则我希望能与你一起度过人生中最美好的时光，舰长大人。只有群星知道接下来会发生什么。”
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."

traits.locale_text: “除非需要我履行职责……否则我希望能与你一起度过人生中最美好的时光，舰长大人。只有群星知道接下来会发生什么。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Hasta que el deber me llame... me gustaría pasar los mejores momentos de mi vida a tu lado, Lord Capitán. Y solo las estrellas saben lo que ocurrirá después».
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta que el deber me llame... me gustaría pasar los mejores momentos de mi vida a tu lado, Lord Capitán. Y solo las estrellas saben lo que ocurrirá después».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「任務を任されるまで…人生で最良の時を、ロード・キャプテン、陛下と共に過ごしたいのです。次に何が起こるかは、星だけが知っているのですから」
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."

traits.locale_text: 「任務を任されるまで…人生で最良の時を、ロード・キャプテン、陛下と共に過ごしたいのです。次に何が起こるかは、星だけが知っているのですから」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bis die Pflicht mich ruft ... möchte ich die besten Augenblicke meines Lebens mit Euch verbringen, Lord Captain. Und nur die Sterne wissen, was als Nächstes geschehen wird."
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."

traits.locale_text: "Bis die Pflicht mich ruft ... möchte ich die besten Augenblicke meines Lebens mit Euch verbringen, Lord Captain. Und nur die Sterne wissen, was als Nächstes geschehen wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « En attendant que le devoir m'appelle... j'aimerais partager les meilleurs moments de ma vie avec vous, Votre Seigneurie. Les étoiles seules savent ce qui se passera par la suite. »
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."

traits.locale_text: « En attendant que le devoir m'appelle... j'aimerais partager les meilleurs moments de ma vie avec vous, Votre Seigneurie. Les étoiles seules savent ce qui se passera par la suite. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vazifem beni çağırana kadar... Hayatımın en güzel anlarını seninle geçirmek istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Sonrasında ne olacağını ise yalnızca yıldızlar bilir."
languages.original_text: "Until duty calls me... I would like to spend the best moments of my life with you, Lord Captain. And only the stars know what will happen next."
